channel.title: NakTac on NakSquad
channel.description: Recent content in NakTac on NakSquad

item.title: General Info
item.description: Some of the things you can expect. list of things Voice Communication Your microphone must be well adjusted and you must be able to communicate clearly. If you are in an environment with a lot of background noise, you may be required to use push-to-talk. Eating is not allowed during our operations, it is only allowed while your microphone is muted in the following situations: Spectator Pre-mission Post-debrief Roleplay This is a light roleplay unit.
